dcterms:creator: H. Wang
S. Sridhar
J. Huang
J. Valentin

L. J. Guibas
dcterms:description: A real-world dataset containing 4.3k images captured from 7 scenes for training and 2.75k images from 6 scenes for testing. It covers objects of 6 known categories, including bottle, bowl, camera, can, laptop, and mug.
dcterms:title: NOCS-REAL275

dcterms:creator: H. Wang
S. Sridhar
J. Huang
J. Valentin
S. Song
L. J. Guibas
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset generated by rendering virtual objects on real backgrounds, sharing the same categories as NOCS-REAL275. It provides 275k images for training and 25k for testing.
dcterms:title: NOCS-CAMERA25
